data.eml:eml: A cave-dwelling Iberian palpigrade (Arachnida: Palpigradi) of the Eukoenenia mirabilis group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mayoral, J. G., Barranco, P. (2017): A cave-dwelling Iberian palpigrade (Arachnida: Palpigradi) of the Eukoenenia mirabilis group. Zootaxa 4363 (4): 561-568, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4363.4.8
